column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday July 1 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: The roadway is shutdown between Walton Ave and Midland Ave/Third St due to flooding.
Inbound traffic diverted to Walton Ave.  Outbound traffic from Midland Ave/Third St diverted to Midland Pl.
Traffic leaving the downtown area toward Winchester Rd may use Main St to Walton Ave to access Winchester Rd.
